A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy destroyed Star Wars with this film. What exactly was the point of Canto Bight? The character of Luke Skywalker was weakened and on top of it all\, killed. RJ spent so much time introducing pointless characters and plots. More time should of been invested introducing the Knights of Ren\, Luke's mourning of Han\, and explaining who Snoke is. Oy Vey...
